priorVersion.title: CDISC SEND Macroscopic Findings Test Name Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C89971

self.title: CDISC SEND Macroscopic Findings Test Name Terminology

definition: Terminology for the test names concerned with the findings from a specimen that are visible to the naked eye.
name: Macroscopic Findings Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC SEND Macroscopic Findings Test Name Terminology

terms.definition: The process by which information about the health status of a subject is obtained after the subject is no longer receiving study medication.
An assessment of macroscopic pathological findings.
